description: This file defines an Angular component 'NotesListComponent' responsible for displaying a list of notes, handling note deletion, and selection. It imports Angular core features, common directives, a router link, and interacts with a notes service and note model.

classes.name: NotesListComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that manages and displays a list of notes, allowing deletion and selection of notes.

methods.name: trackById
methods.description: A tracking function used for optimization in Angular ngFor to track items by their id.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Emits a delete event when a note should be deleted.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Sets the selected note id when a note is selected.
